products.name: Cables
products.description: We carry various cables such as ESP, logging, and cable protectors.

Pipe and Cable Penetration Sealing Syste.name: Pipe and Cable Penetration Sealing Systems

products.name: Pipe And Cable Penetration Sealing Systems
products.description:
Features: 
• Fire ratings: J-90 & H-120 class
• Approved and certified by ABS for
J-90 class first post-blast of 4.2 bar
• Approved and certified by ABS, BV,
and DNV for H-120 class
• Resistant to jet-fire, hydrocarbon-fire
• Weather/seawater/shock/blast
resistant
• Excellent vibration durability and high
tension tolerance
• Abrasion/friction/corrosion resistance
in seawater
• Strong resistance to hydrocarbon
splash, liquefied gas, liquid fuel, UV
light, and ozone
• Tailored designs to suit each
installation and fulfill all customer
requirements
• Low maintenance
• Non-asbestos

Specifications: 
• Color: Black
• Capacity: piece [each]
• Service life: more than 40 years
• Service temperature: -60°C to 250°C
• Specific gravity: 1.5 g/cm3 to 1.7 g/cm3
• Compressive strength: over 4.5 bar
• Pressure strength: 0.27MPa to 0.64
MPa[25%]
• Elongation: 150 ~ 250%
• Hardness: 44 ~ 55 shore A
• Elasticity: 55%
• Storage temperature: room
temperature
• UV test: grade 5, (40±1)°C, 24 hours
• Cold shock: no crack, (-55±1)°C, 3
minutes
